</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Map </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds the next frame to the map animation. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> map '''ctrlMapAnimAdd''' [time, zoom, position] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> map: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [time, zoom, position]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> time: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> zoom: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - formats: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]], [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_map [[ctrlMapAnimAdd]] [1, 0.1, [[getMarkerPos]] "anim1"];

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 03:48, 27 August 2017</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Demellion|Demellion]]
<dd class="note">Map control created with [[ctrlCreate]] have a weird behaviour. Control doesn't respect the aspects of Controls Group or Display itself. Results of '''ctrlMapAnimAdd''' applied to this control are also shifted for some reason.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
